content.description: In sentence 17 (reproduced below), which of the following versions of the underlined text provides relevant, specific information that helps the audience understand the study?
content.question: The robots—while the children were able to do the task correctly when they were absent—unanimously gave an incorrect answer first.

choices.label: less influential when the experiment was repeated with adult subjects
programmed to glance at one another, as though considering the question together
a variation on an experiment conducted with only human participants

content.answer: programmed to glance at one another, as though considering the question together

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
